This is a simple generic project template should get you started...
This is the info in "Project.txt"

* Author:  Author's Name
* Revision:  1.0.0
* Date:  Month Day, Year, Time

Description:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
[New Project] is a module for ...

Project Specifics:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Enter information that is particular to the project you are working on.

Credits:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
* [New Project] Module:
  Author name
  mailto:author@email.com
  http://www.author.com/

* etc...
